casebody.data:
(May 25, 1951.)

(Republish.)

Chase National Bank of the City of New York, Plaintiff, v. Directorate General of Postal Remittances & Savings Bank et al., Appellants; T. Y. Ho et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants.

Order unanimously modified so as to refer to a referee, to hear and to report to Special Term, on the status of the bank and authority of counsel and legal representation. No opinion. Settle order on notice. Present — Peek, P. J., Glennon, Cohn, Callahan and Shientag, JJ. [See ante, p. 820; post, p. 935.]
